section.name: Directions
section.p: Mevenide is a work in progress and thus there are a lot of items that need to be worked out. For those who want to help, here is a non exhaustive list of such items. - altho please note that most items listed here are Eclipse related since Eclipse is the only targeted IDE for now.

ul.li: Provide Extensible Maven Wizard to allow easy creation of different kind of mavenized projects (web , ejb, aspectj, etc.)
Split Mevenide preferences page into multiple, context-related, preferences pages
Provide preferences extension mechanism to allow Maven plugins providers to easily plug into Mevenide
Provide project properties page that override mevenide preferences
Provide a really integrated Maven Console
Polish the Synchronization feature (perhaps providing a view like the new CVS Synchronize View)

section.p: Alternatively the various Maven plugins created to help the build process could make better and more useful/customizable.
